comment: BEST PROFESSOR EVER! Easy A. Minor weekly assignment apart from the 3 essays you must write. None exceeds two pages in length. Gives every resource and instruction needed to write your essay, and offers weeks to complete it. Super kind and cares about her students. TAKE HER!!

!!TAKE HER!! There are a couple of papers, but they all help you out in the real world. She will help out her students in any way she can by giving extensions or extra credit. She is why I passed this class. It's easy to understand her assignments and what you need to do for them. Also, she gives good feedback on assignments. 10/10 recommend :)
Easy A, clear instructions, good feedback, the only thing is she replies to emails slowly. As long u don't miss any due dates n turn in ur work on time, ur fine.

Professor Collins was great! Extremely lenient as long as you get quality worked turned in. She was also very understanding during our presentation assignment and offered to do private zoom presentations instead of presenting front of the class, which I really appreciated!

Dr. Collins is one of the sweetest, most understanding professors at KSU!  She gave 2 quizzes in the entire semester that were open notes! Only 1 essay (exploratory) and a presentation at the end of the semester, which she allowed us to present in private to her! SHE IS UNDERSTANDING so communicate with her if you have an issue. TAKE HER!!!

Professor Collins is amazing!! I took her for ENGL 1101 online and she made the class so fun. She gives a couple extra credit assignments and has an easy work load. She is also always available and quick with her email responses. I would 100% recommend her and would love to take her again!

Super sweet lady! Very loose deadlines and cares about the success of her students. There were a few extra credit options but you'll do well enough that you won't really have to do the assignments. I would take another class with her in the future.

Professor Collins is amazing!! Se is so encouraging and understanding you can tell she wants you to do well! If you reach out to her for help or an extension she gives it and usually responds to emails within the hour. I made a 98 in her class and was able to get off academic probation. I loved her class; she's the absolute best!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Professor Collins is definitely someone you want to take, she is such a sweet caring person. I had a rough semester and she would check in on me and work with me when stuff was late, she also helped me out a lot when it came to writing papers we had in class.

I cannot stress enough how considerate and respectfulnot only as a professor, but as a HUMAN BEING professor Collins is!!! she is amazing, very organized, and great for online. I can only imagine how great she would be for in person classes. 10/10

Y'all I swear she is such a great professor. She gives so many resources and examples for essays. I promise she won't leave you out there high and dry. She's patient and she will stay after class if you have questions. She always gives you a chance to revise your essays and you can earn points back. Also she's not a heavy grader!

I loved her class so much this semester that im taking her again for 1102. She's so nice and makes class fun with our discussions. no test/quizzes, very little work but enough for cushion and she gives extra credit opportunities for points added to your OVERALL GRADE. Im finishing her class with 100% and i would 10/10 reccomend taking her class.

There's only one essay per month and she isn't a harsh grader AT ALL. Her class is only one day a week but she always answers emails outside of class, even on weekends. She gives like 1 or 2 small assignments for cushion each month but they aren't hard and there are no real test or quizzes. she provides the textbook for 1101 so don't buy it.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Amazing Professor. Best one Ive had yet. TAKE HER IF YOU GET THE CHANCE! I finished with a 100% in her class. So sweet, cares VERY much about her students and their well-being and mental health. Extremely fair and helpful. Lots of extra credit. She is the epitome of what an educator should be. Shes funny and kind and understands you have a life!

This class is actually useful. We created resumes, cover letters, and professional bios. Not only that, We researched topics in our field that brought awareness to the challenges we may face. She gives clear instructions and gives you a chance to correct your paper. Take her class! You won't waste your money.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: Professor Collins is probably the best English professor you can ever take!! She is kind, funny, engaging, and full out amazing. She is a student advocate so any problems you have with just about anything, she is an easy person to open up to and trust. If you ever have a chance to take her PLS DO! She is a blessing in disguise.

This was my second time taking prof Collins. Took her for ENGL 1101 and she was truly amazing that I had to take her for ENGL 1102. She is very understanding that we have other classes to do and will extend due dates. She knows that most of us aren't trying to become English majors so takes it very easy on us. Do the work and it will be an easy A!

I cannot stress enough how amazing she is. Her class is very beneficial because she actually teaches us stuff we need in real life like resumes, cover letters, etc. There are 2 papers exploratory and Research but she allows you to use the exploratory essay for your research you just have to add a couple more pages. TAKE HER! you will not regret!

Professor Collins is the best! You wont regret taking her class! She gives out multiple extra credit opportunitys. Its impossible to fail her class. Shes very kind and acknowledges that we have other classes to worry about and will sometimes push back due dates on some occasions. No tests, it was mainly just discussion posts and essays. Easy A!

She is amazing! She understands that there is a pandemic going around so she gives a lot of extra time to complete assignments. we have one assignment a weeks, sometimes an assignment for 3 weeks, and once we did not have anything but extra credit.

I loved Professor Collins! I wish I could take her for all my English classes. She is very sweet and genuinely wants you to succeed. The best way to pass her class is to go to class. She gives pointers and examples on what she wants for a A. There is extra credit. We perfected our resumes, cover letters, and cover sheets. TAKE HER!! I got a 98!

This class is basically a repeat of things you've learned in high school, but Ms. Collins does it with enthusiasm. It makes the dull class much more bearable. I had her during the corona lockdown, and she offered help over email and video chat. I did email a few times and got a reply in 24h. Definitely one of the best professors I've had so far
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: Professor Collins was an amazing professor. TAKE HER. A very understanding and sweet person, you can tell she wants her students to succeed. Easy activities just do them & you'll make a 100. only 3 essays, 2 projects, weren't too bad & she graded fairly, just follow what shes asking for. Extra credit too This was one my favorites professors.
Very understanding and caring. Great professor

Professor Collins was easily my favorite professor I have had in a while. She is extremely clear on what she wants in essays and other graded activities. She is a professor that actually cares about you and your grade, so she is willing to work with you. If you ever have a question ask and email her she emails back quickly!!
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria--Amazing lectures

comment: I had Collins for her first semester at KSU and she is a very sweet lady. A little tough on grading, just know MLA. You get to chose your research paper topic, and other assignments are easy 100s (just go to class). Easy A, great prof. I wish her the best of luck and would take her again!

If you're taking ENG 1102 next semster you want her. She is very kind, and honsetly for being such a young professor, teaches better than most who have been teaching for years. Even though she's sweet, she expects everyone to be doing there best in class and is sort of knit-picky on papers, as long as you come to class, you get a 100 on quizzes.

Honestly, this is one of the easiest classes I've ever taken. On top of that, she is one of the sweetest people I have ever meet. This class is not hard at all, we had two quizzes and the rest are activities that you can easily make 100 on. If you go and talk to her if you end up struggling in class she will definitely help you.
